title: Two shot near Hillside High
text:
Two shot near Hillside High 
Posted 14 minutes ago Your friends e-mail addresses (comma separated): * Subject: * 
Durham, N.C. — Two people were shot Thursday morning a couple of blocks from Hillside High School in Durham, police said. 
The shooting occurred at about 10:30 a.m. on Tralea Drive and Four Seasons Drive, police said. 
Both victims suffered serious wounds and were taken to a nearby hospital for treatment, police said. 
Hillside High and W.G. Pearson Elementary School were under lockout conditions – outside access was restricted, but classes continued as normal inside – for a short time after the shooting, Durham Public Schools officials said. Credits
